opticalimagestabilization: Automatically adjusts unintentional camera movements giving you clear, crisp pictures every time.
electronicviewfinder: An option for more accurate depiction in real time through the eyepiece for better scene composition.
highdynamicrange: Enhance the beauty of low-light images - unite the most detailed portions of three different exposures, to create one perfect photo.
supportedflashmemory: SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card
